meanings.definition: A type of jellyfish or jellyfish-like marine animal.
meanings.sent1: The acalephs gracefully floated in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study acalephs to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The acalephs had a party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The acalephs danced in the water like delicate ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering acalephs illuminated the dark depths of the sea.

meanings.definition: A member of the class Scyphozoa, which includes jellyfish.
meanings.sent1: Each acalephs belongs to the Scyphozoa class.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium displayed various acalephs from the Scyphozoa group.
meanings.sent3: The acalephs in the Scyphozoa class had a meeting.
meanings.sent4: She moved through the crowd like a lone acalephs in a sea of fish.
meanings.sent5: The acalephs, proud members of Scyphozoa, glided through the water.

meanings.definition: Any of various gelatinous marine animals.
meanings.sent1: The divers encountered colorful acalephs during their expedition.
meanings.sent2: Acalephs are fascinating gelatinous creatures of the sea.
meanings.sent3: The acalephs played hide-and-seek in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent4: The acalephs pulsated with vibrant hues under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Children love watching the translucent acalephs at the aquarium.
